ExternalLearning.name: ExternalLearning
ExternalLearning.description: Represents information that defines a training that is made available by an external provider as a course, program, or on-site experience, for a contact.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency.

Description.description: The description of the External Learning.

Duration.description: The duration of the External Learning.

DurationUnits.description: Specifies the duration unit of the External Learning.

FieldOfStudy.description: Specifies the field of study for the External Learning.

Identifier.description: The identifier of the External Learning.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the External Learning is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearningId.description: The parent Learning related to the External Learning.

Name.description: The name of the External Learning.

ProviderId.description: The educational institution related to the External Learning.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the External Learning.
